description: Creates a set of columns of sines and cosines for bandpassing via regression.

band.title: Passband frequencies
band.description: Specify lowest and highest frequencies in the passband.

invert.title: Invert selection flag
invert.description: Invert the selection after computing which frequency indexes correspond to the input band(s).

nozero.title: No zero frequency flag
nozero.description: Do NOT generate the 0 frequency (constant) component when fbot = 0.

noconst.title: No constant flag
noconst.description: Same as -nozero. Do NOT generate the 0 frequency (constant) component when fbot = 0.

quad.title: Quadratic trend flag
quad.description: Add regressors for linear and quadratic trends.

nodata.title: NODATA option
nodata.description: Specify the number of time points and optionally TR value for the simulation.

concat.title: Concat file
concat.description: Specify the list of start indexes for concatenated runs.
